section.p: The SDK uses the class to send callbacks to the app. The app inherits the methods of this class to receive these callbacks. All methods in this class have default (empty) implementations. Therefore, apps only need to register callbacks according to the scenario. In the callbacks, avoid time-consuming tasks or calling APIs that can block the thread, such as the method. Otherwise, the SDK may not work properly.

plentry.pd: Callback events to be added. For details, see .
